topic.title: Smoking Status Meaningful Use2 - conformance rules

section.p: This template represents the current smoking status of the patient as specified in Meaningful Use (MU) Stage 2 requirements. Historic smoking status observations as well as details about the smoking habit (e.g., how many per day) would be represented in the Tobacco Use template. This template represents a "snapshot in time" observation, simply reflecting what the patient's current smoking status is at the time of the observation. As a result, the effectiveTime is constrained to a time stamp, and will approximately correspond with the author/time. Details regarding the time period when the patient is/was smoking would be recorded in the Tobacco Use template. If the patient's current smoking status is unknown, the value element must be populated with SNOMED CT code 266927001 to communicate "Unknown if ever smoked" from the Current Smoking Status Value Set.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1098-14815, CONF:1098-14816, CONF:1098-32573 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.78"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2014-06-09"
SHALL conform to Smoking Status Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.78)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:1098-32401)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-19170)/@code="72166-2" Tobacco smoking status NHIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1098-31039, CONF:1098-32157, DSTU:596)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:1098-14810), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Current Smoking Status 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.38 STATIC 2014-09-01 (CONF:1098-14817)
If the patient's current smoking status is unknown, @code SHALL contain '266927001' (Unknown if ever smoked) from ValueSet Current Smoking Status (2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.38 STATIC 2014-09-01) (CONF:1098-31019).

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:1098-31928, DSTU:596, DSTU:597)
Note: This template represents a "snapshot in time" observation, simply reflecting what the patient's current smoking status is at the time of the observation. As a result, the effectiveTime is constrained to just a time stamp, and will approximately correspond with the author/time.

SHOULD contain [0..*] author such that it (CONF:1098-31148)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)
SHALL conform to Smoking Status Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.78)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:14806, R2.0=CONF:1098-14806)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:14807, R2.0=CONF:1098-14807)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:1098-32401)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-19170)/@code="72166-2" Tobacco smoking status NHIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1098-31039, CONF:1098-32157, DSTU:596)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:14809, R2.0=CONF:1098-14809, R2.0=CONF:1098-19116)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:1098-31928, DSTU:596, DSTU:597)
Note: This template represents a "snapshot in time" observation, simply reflecting what the patient's current smoking status is at the time of the observation. As a result, the effectiveTime is constrained to just a time stamp, and will approximately correspond with the author/time.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:1098-14810), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Current Smoking Status 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.38 STATIC 2014-09-01 (CONF:1098-14817)
If the patient's current smoking status is unknown, @code SHALL contain '266927001' (Unknown if ever smoked) from ValueSet Current Smoking Status (2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.38 STATIC 2014-09-01) (CONF:1098-31019).

SHOULD contain [0..*] author such that it (CONF:1098-31148)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)

body.codeblock: <observation xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.78" extension="2014-06-09"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.78"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.78" extension="2014-06-09"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.78"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="474320563"/> <code code="72166-2" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Tobacco smoking status NHIS"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <value xsi:type="CD" code="691389171"/> <author> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119"/> <time/> <assignedAuthor> <id root="MDHT" extension="1479855398"/> <code code="1162896385"/> <assignedPerson/> <representedOrganization/> </assignedAuthor> </author> </observation>

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:14815, CONF:14816 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.78"
SHALL conform to CDA Observation
Consol Smoking Status Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:14806, R2.0=CONF:1098-14806)
Consol Smoking Status Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:14807, R2.0=CONF:1098-14807)
Consol Smoking Status Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:14808)

Consol Smoking Status Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:14809, R2.0=CONF:1098-14809, R2.0=CONF:1098-19116)

Consol Smoking Status Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:14814, DSTU:596-relaxed-to-warning, DSTU:597) Note: This template represents a "snapshot in time" observation, simply reflecting what the patient's current smoking status is at the time of the observation. As a result, the effectiveTime is constrained to just a time stamp, and will approximately correspond with the author/time.

Consol Smoking Status Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:14810), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Current Smoking Status 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.38 STATIC 2014-09-01 (CONF:14817)
Extends IVL TS
Consol IVLTS SHOULD NOT contain [0..0] center (DSTU:596-relaxed-to-warning, DSTU:597)
Consol IVLTS SHOULD NOT contain [0..0] high (DSTU:596-relaxed-to-warning, DSTU:597)
Consol IVLTS SHOULD NOT contain [0..0] low (DSTU:596-relaxed-to-warning, DSTU:597)
Consol IVLTS SHOULD NOT contain [0..0] width (DSTU:596-relaxed-to-warning, DSTU:597)

Consol CD /@code SHALL="ASSERTION" Assertion (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode) OR code/@code SHALL="72166-2" Tobacco smoking status NHIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:14808, DSTU:596)
Consol CD SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:14808, R2.1=CONF:1098-19170)
Consol CD SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] codeSystem (CONF:14808, R2.1=CONF:1098-19170)
